page.title: 04School life
page.content: In our school there are about{250 {children.}This is small compared to some schools but big to others. There is a saying that your school days are the best days in your life. But you will find not many children agree. There are{33 children}in our class which means it is full. We have old fashioned desks in our classroom. Our school is a{114 years old.}I think the desks are better than drawers. In our classroom we have{two {computers.}They are both Dragons. Our class teacher is called Mr Benson. He is quite funny, although he is a big teaser. We have{two playtimes}and{one {lunchtime.}The two playtimes each last 25 minutes and lunchtime 1 hour. School starts at 9.00am and finishes at 3.30pm.
